_source.summary: Lincolnshire UK Spots a Line of 8-10 dots Unexplained!
_source.description: Lincolnshire UK Spots a Line of 8-10 dots Unexplained!Went to smoke my bedtime cigarette, went to end of large garden, laid on the grass and as I do, I look up as the stars in Kent aren't the same (visiting my parents btw) I've been caught to very high altitude, low continuous glow of a line moving in the sky, as both eyes locked on and I focused, there it cleared to 8-10 very distinctive yet very faint dots in a solid single lined formation moving over the sky's, too high to be birds at this time, flightrader has nothing of the sort and I was mesmorised by these objects which then frazzled out as the outer skys brighter than when I locked on to begin with.  If it wasn't Military (which don't fly weekends here, nor a drop to land at that altitude, etc., is veeery unlikely.  My staffy Bailey even decided to whine to go in, (almost waking the parents!)
